events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been successfully categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specialized in Engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application moving forward.
Your initial screening has been completed positively, and we are impressed with your background and skills.
Thank you for your prompt reply and confirming your availability for the upcoming interview stages.
We have scheduled your technical interview for April 7th at 10 AM UTC with our lead software engineer.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went very well, and you expressed great alignment with our corporate values.
We have formally proposed an offer for the Software Engineer position and sent the details to your email.
Thank you for providing your feedback and confirming your interest in joining our Engineering team.
We are excited to confirm that you have accepted our offer and will be joining the company soon.
Your onboarding process has begun. Welcome to the Engineering team, and we look forward to your contributions.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position has been successfully closed with your start onboarded.
